verses.name: Luke 11:10
verses.text: For every one that asketh receiveth; and he that seeketh findeth; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened.

verses.name: Luke 11:11
verses.text: If a son shall ask bread of any of you that is a father, will he give him a stone? or if he ask a fish, will he for a fish give him a serpent?

verses.name: Luke 11:12
verses.text: Or if he shall ask an egg, will he offer him a scorpion?

verses.name: Luke 11:13
verses.text: If ye then, being evil, know how to give good gifts unto your children: how much more shall your heavenly Father give the Holy Spirit to them that ask him?
